quest.name: A Favor Repaid
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened means to return the Dotharl's kindness.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested supplies to the Namazu culinarian.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to the Namazu culinarianMine [Error] south of ReunionGather [Error] south of ReunionCatch [Error] at Dotharl Khaa.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: The Dotharl have been so very generous in educating us in the ways of archery, I thought it only natural that we repay them somehow. Thus, did I seek out our most skilled chef to prepare an assortment of delicious delights in their honor.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Yes, there is no denying his culinary prowess, so long as he has an assistant to keep him on course, at least. On his own, well...if he were a Hyuran Elezena Lalafella Miqo'tea Roegadynan Au Raa Hrothgara Viera like you I would say he's all thumbs.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: He's presently at Nhaama's Retreat gathering ingredients. It would put my mind at ease to know you were there to help him.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: Sent by Seigetsu, you say? Oh, thank the heavens. I've made a complete hash of things, and not the delicious sort. No, no.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: I somehow managed to ruin my favorite cooking knife. The blade is broken─split cleanly in two. Could you fashion another? Please, please? This crate here should have what you need.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: I somehow managed to ruin my favorite cooking knife. The handle simply snapped off while I was mincing some herbs. Could you fashion another? Please, please? This crate here should have what you need.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: I somehow managed to ruin my favorite cooking knife. The handle's fallen off, and I need something to stick it back together. I don't suppose you could create an adhesive? Please, please? This crate should have what you need to see the job done.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: My cooking knife has grown rather dull, fairly blunt, and I cannot find my whetstone. I would be ever so grateful if you could procure another. The mineral deposits south of Reunion are like to have something I can use.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: In my haste to gather ingredients, I've misplaced one of my steppe fruit. Would you procure another for me? Please, please? You'll find them growing in abundance south of Reunion.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: In my haste to gather ingredients, I've misplaced my trout. Would you fish up another for me? Please, please. With a bit of salmon roe you'll have them biting in no time at the pond in Dotharl Khaa.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: If there's anything else you need─anything at all─don't hesitate to ask. I'll be here gathering more herbs for our tribute to the Dotharl.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: This crate here is teeming with supplies. You're certain to find what you need inside.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: This crate here is teeming with supplies. You're certain to find what you need inside.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: This crate here is teeming with supplies. You're certain to find what you need inside.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: I'm sure any whetstone you find south of Reunion will be fine. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: I'm sure any steppe fruit south of Reunion will serve nicely. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: I'm sure any trout you fish up at Dotharl Khaa will serve nicely. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: I imagine I'll have gathered enough herbs here by the time you finish. Do try not to take too long, though.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: Oh, yes, yes! This is perfect. Exactly what I needed. At last I can finish my work.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: I've created several original dishes specifically for this occasion. Hopefully they prove to the Dotharl's liking.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: The Dotharl were quite taken with my cooking last time, delighted by its myriad flavors. I'm sure they'll love my next culinary creation!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: Tell Seigetsu to expect a dish worthy of the Big One himself. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03126
dialogue.text: Thank you again for your help, misssir. Tell Seigetsu I won't be much longer.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Welcome back, friend. How fares our chef?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Did he now? Thankfully my surpassing foresight was able to lead you to him in his hour of need.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: The Dotharl are like to experience a meal unlike any other. Assuming, of course, the chef doesn't literally throw himself into his work.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: <sigh> To think I ever wondered why my kin have had such trouble mastering the bow.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: At our present pace, I daresay we'll be keeping the Dotharls' bellies full for quite some time. Should our chef be beset by troubles again, I hope we can count on your help.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items gathered in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
